00105 /*
00106  * Lookup target by FID.
00107  *
00108  * Lookup MDT/OST target index by FID. Type of the target can be
00109  * specific or any.
00110  *
00111  * \param[in] env               LU environment provided by the caller
00112  * \param[in] lod               lod device
00113  * \param[in] fid               FID
00114  * \param[out] tgt              result target index
00115  * \param[in] type              expected type of the target:
00116  *                              LU_SEQ_RANGE_{MDT,OST,ANY}
00117  *
00118  * \retval 0                    on success
00119  * \retval negative             negated errno on error
00120  **/
00121 int lod_fld_lookup(const struct lu_env *env, struct lod_device *lod,
00122                    const struct lu_fid *fid, __u32 *tgt, int *type)
00123 {
00124         struct lu_seq_range     range = { 0 };
00125         struct lu_server_fld    *server_fld;
00126         int rc;
00127         ENTRY;
00128 
00129         if (!fid_is_sane(fid)) {
00130                 CERROR("%s: invalid FID "DFID"\n", lod2obd(lod)->obd_name,
00131                        PFID(fid));
00132                 RETURN(-EIO);
00133         }
00134 
00135         if (fid_is_idif(fid)) {
00136                 *tgt = fid_idif_ost_idx(fid);
00137                 *type = LU_SEQ_RANGE_OST;
00138                 RETURN(0);
00139         }
00140 
00141         if (fid_is_update_log(fid) || fid_is_update_log_dir(fid)) {
00142                 *tgt = fid_oid(fid);
00143                 *type = LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT;
00144                 RETURN(0);
00145         }
00146 
00147         if (!lod->lod_initialized || (!fid_seq_in_fldb(fid_seq(fid)))) {
00148                 LASSERT(lu_site2seq(lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site) != NULL);
00149 
00150                 *tgt = lu_site2seq(lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site)->ss_node_id;
00151                 *type = LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT;
00152                 RETURN(0);
00153         }
00154 
00155         server_fld = lu_site2seq(lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site)->ss_server_fld;
00156         if (server_fld == NULL)
00157                 RETURN(-EIO);
00158 
00159         fld_range_set_type(&range, *type);
00160         rc = fld_server_lookup(env, server_fld, fid_seq(fid), &range);
00161         if (rc != 0)
00162                 RETURN(rc);
00163 
00164         *tgt = range.lsr_index;
00165         *type = range.lsr_flags;
00166 
00167         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: got tgt %x for sequence: "LPX64"\n",
00168                lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, *tgt, fid_seq(fid));
00169 
00170         RETURN(0);
00171 }

00178 static struct lu_kmem_descr lod_caches[] = {

00181                 .ckd_name  = "lod_obj",
00182                 .ckd_size  = sizeof(struct lod_object)
00183         },

00186                 .ckd_name  = "lod_txn_callback",
00187                 .ckd_size  = sizeof(struct dt_txn_callback)

00191         }

00204 static struct lu_object *lod_object_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00205                                           const struct lu_object_header *hdr,
00206                                           struct lu_device *dev)
00207 {
00208         struct lod_object       *lod_obj;
00209         struct lu_object        *lu_obj;
00210         ENTRY;
00211 
00212         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(lod_obj, lod_object_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00213         if (lod_obj == NULL)
00214                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00215 
00216         lu_obj = lod2lu_obj(lod_obj);
00217         dt_object_init(&lod_obj->ldo_obj, NULL, dev);
00218         lod_obj->ldo_obj.do_ops = &lod_obj_ops;
00219         lu_obj->lo_ops = &lod_lu_obj_ops;
00220 
00221         RETURN(lu_obj);
00222 }

00239 static int lod_sub_process_config(const struct lu_env *env,
00240                                  struct lod_device *lod,
00241                                  struct lod_tgt_descs *ltd,
00242                                  struct lustre_cfg *lcfg)
00243 {
00244         struct lu_device  *next;
00245         int rc = 0;
00246         unsigned int i;
00247 
00248         lod_getref(ltd);
00249         if (ltd->ltd_tgts_size <= 0) {
00250                 lod_putref(lod, ltd);
00251                 return 0;
00252         }
00253         cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
00254                 struct lod_tgt_desc *tgt;
00255                 int rc1;
00256 
00257                 tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
00258                 LASSERT(tgt && tgt->ltd_tgt);
00259                 next = &tgt->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev;
00260                 rc1 = next->ld_ops->ldo_process_config(env, next, lcfg);
00261                 if (rc1) {
00262                         CERROR("%s: error cleaning up LOD index %u: cmd %#x"
00263                                ": rc = %d\n", lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, i,
00264                                lcfg->lcfg_command, rc1);
00265                         rc = rc1;
00266                 }
00267         }
00268         lod_putref(lod, ltd);
00269         return rc;
00270 }

00272 struct lod_recovery_data {
00273         struct lod_device       *lrd_lod;
00274         struct lod_tgt_desc     *lrd_ltd;
00275         struct ptlrpc_thread    *lrd_thread;
00276         __u32                   lrd_idx;
00277 };

00296 static int lod_process_recovery_updates(const struct lu_env *env,
00297                                         struct llog_handle *llh,
00298                                         struct llog_rec_hdr *rec,
00299                                         void *data)
00300 {
00301         struct lod_recovery_data        *lrd = data;
00302         struct llog_cookie      *cookie = &lod_env_info(env)->lti_cookie;
00303         struct lu_target                *lut;
00304         __u32                           index = 0;
00305         ENTRY;
00306 
00307         if (lrd->lrd_ltd == NULL) {
00308                 int rc;
00309 
00310                 rc = lodname2mdt_index(lod2obd(lrd->lrd_lod)->obd_name, &index);
00311                 if (rc != 0)
00312                         return rc;
00313         } else {
00314                 index = lrd->lrd_ltd->ltd_index;
00315         }
00316 
00317         if (rec->lrh_len !=
00318                 llog_update_record_size((struct llog_update_record *)rec)) {
00319                 CERROR("%s broken update record! index %u "DOSTID":%u :"
00320                        " rc = %d\n", lod2obd(lrd->lrd_lod)->obd_name, index,
00321                        POSTID(&llh->lgh_id.lgl_oi), rec->lrh_index, -EIO);
00322                 return -EINVAL;
00323         }
00324 
00325         cookie->lgc_lgl = llh->lgh_id;
00326         cookie->lgc_index = rec->lrh_index;
00327         cookie->lgc_subsys = LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT;
00328 
00329         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: process recovery updates "DOSTID":%u\n",
00330                lod2obd(lrd->lrd_lod)->obd_name,
00331                POSTID(&llh->lgh_id.lgl_oi), rec->lrh_index);
00332         lut = lod2lu_dev(lrd->lrd_lod)->ld_site->ls_tgt;
00333 
00334         if (lut->lut_obd->obd_stopping ||
00335             lut->lut_obd->obd_abort_recovery)
00336                 return -ESHUTDOWN;
00337 
00338         return insert_update_records_to_replay_list(lut->lut_tdtd,
00339                                         (struct llog_update_record *)rec,
00340                                         cookie, index);
00341 }
00342 
00354 static int lod_sub_recovery_thread(void *arg)
00355 {
00356         struct lod_recovery_data        *lrd = arg;
00357         struct lod_device               *lod = lrd->lrd_lod;
00358         struct dt_device                *dt;
00359         struct ptlrpc_thread            *thread = lrd->lrd_thread;
00360         struct llog_ctxt                *ctxt = NULL;
00361         struct lu_env                   env;
00362         struct lu_target *lut;
00363 
00364 
00365         int                             rc;
00366         ENTRY;
00367 
00368         thread->t_flags = SVC_RUNNING;
00369         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00370 
00371         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL | LCT_MD_THREAD);
00372         if (rc != 0) {
00373                 OBD_FREE_PTR(lrd);
00374                 CERROR("%s: can't initialize env: rc = %d\n",
00375                        lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, rc);
00376                 RETURN(rc);
00377         }
00378 
00379         lut = lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site->ls_tgt;
00380         atomic_inc(&lut->lut_tdtd->tdtd_recovery_threads_count);
00381         if (lrd->lrd_ltd == NULL)
00382                 dt = lod->lod_child;
00383         else
00384                 dt = lrd->lrd_ltd->ltd_tgt;
00385 
00386 again:
00387         rc = lod_sub_prep_llog(&env, lod, dt, lrd->lrd_idx);
00388         if (rc == 0) {
00389                 /* Process the recovery record */
00390                 ctxt = llog_get_context(dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd,
00391                                         LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
00392                 LASSERT(ctxt != NULL);
00393                 LASSERT(ctxt->loc_handle != NULL);
00394 
00395                 rc = llog_cat_process(&env, ctxt->loc_handle,
00396                                       lod_process_recovery_updates, lrd, 0, 0);
00397         }
00398 
00399         if (rc < 0) {
00400                 struct lu_device *top_device;
00401 
00402                 top_device = lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site->ls_top_dev;
00403                 /* Because the remote target might failover at the same time,
00404                  * let's retry here */
00405                 if ((rc == -ETIMEDOUT || rc == -EAGAIN || rc == -EIO) &&
00406                      dt != lod->lod_child &&
00407                     !top_device->ld_obd->obd_abort_recovery &&
00408                     !top_device->ld_obd->obd_stopping) {
00409                         if (ctxt != NULL) {
00410                                 if (ctxt->loc_handle != NULL)
00411                                         llog_cat_close(&env,
00412                                                        ctxt->loc_handle);
00413                                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00414                         }
00415                         goto again;
00416                 }
00417 
00418                 CERROR("%s getting update log failed: rc = %d\n",
00419                        dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00420                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00421 
00422                 spin_lock(&top_device->ld_obd->obd_dev_lock);
00423                 if (!top_device->ld_obd->obd_abort_recovery &&
00424                     !top_device->ld_obd->obd_stopping)
00425                         top_device->ld_obd->obd_abort_recovery = 1;
00426                 spin_unlock(&top_device->ld_obd->obd_dev_lock);
00427 
00428                 GOTO(out, rc);
00429         }
00430         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00431 
00432         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s retrieve update log: rc = %d\n",
00433                dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00434 
00435         if (lrd->lrd_ltd == NULL)
00436                 lod->lod_child_got_update_log = 1;
00437         else
00438                 lrd->lrd_ltd->ltd_got_update_log = 1;
00439 
00440         if (lod->lod_child_got_update_log) {
00441                 struct lod_tgt_descs    *ltd = &lod->lod_mdt_descs;
00442                 struct lod_tgt_desc     *tgt = NULL;
00443                 bool                    all_got_log = true;
00444                 int                     i;
00445 
00446                 cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
00447                         tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
00448                         if (!tgt->ltd_got_update_log) {
00449                                 all_got_log = false;
00450                                 break;
00451                         }
00452                 }
00453 
00454                 if (all_got_log) {
00455                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s got update logs from all MDTs.\n",
00456                                lut->lut_obd->obd_name);
00457                         lut->lut_tdtd->tdtd_replay_ready = 1;
00458                         wake_up(&lut->lut_obd->obd_next_transno_waitq);
00459                 }
00460         }
00461 
00462 out:
00463         OBD_FREE_PTR(lrd);
00464         thread->t_flags = SVC_STOPPED;
00465         atomic_dec(&lut->lut_tdtd->tdtd_recovery_threads_count);
00466         wake_up(&lut->lut_tdtd->tdtd_recovery_threads_waitq);
00467         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00468         lu_env_fini(&env);
00469         RETURN(rc);
00470 }
00471 
00482 void lod_sub_fini_llog(const struct lu_env *env,
00483                        struct dt_device *dt, struct ptlrpc_thread *thread)
00484 {
00485         struct obd_device       *obd;
00486         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00487         ENTRY;
00488 
00489         obd = dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd;
00490         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: finish sub llog\n", obd->obd_name);
00491         /* Stop recovery thread first */
00492         if (thread != NULL && thread->t_flags & SVC_RUNNING) {
00493                 thread->t_flags = SVC_STOPPING;
00494                 wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00495                 wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq, thread->t_flags & SVC_STOPPED);
00496         }
00497 
00498         ctxt = llog_get_context(obd, LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
00499         if (ctxt == NULL)
00500                 RETURN_EXIT;
00501 
00502         if (ctxt->loc_handle != NULL)
00503                 llog_cat_close(env, ctxt->loc_handle);
00504 
00505         llog_cleanup(env, ctxt);
00506 
00507         RETURN_EXIT;
00508 }
00509 
00522 int lodname2mdt_index(char *lodname, __u32 *mdt_index)
00523 {
00524         unsigned long index;
00525         char *ptr, *tmp;
00526 
00527         /* 1.8 configs don't have "-MDT0000" at the end */
00528         ptr = strstr(lodname, "-MDT");
00529         if (ptr == NULL) {
00530                 *mdt_index = 0;
00531                 return 0;
00532         }
00533 
00534         ptr = strrchr(lodname, '-');
00535         if (ptr == NULL) {
00536                 CERROR("invalid MDT index in '%s'\n", lodname);
00537                 return -EINVAL;
00538         }
00539 
00540         if (strncmp(ptr, "-mdtlov", 7) != 0) {
00541                 CERROR("invalid MDT index in '%s'\n", lodname);
00542                 return -EINVAL;
00543         }
00544 
00545         if ((unsigned long)ptr - (unsigned long)lodname <= 8) {
00546                 CERROR("invalid MDT index in '%s'\n", lodname);
00547                 return -EINVAL;
00548         }
00549 
00550         if (strncmp(ptr - 8, "-MDT", 4) != 0) {
00551                 CERROR("invalid MDT index in '%s'\n", lodname);
00552                 return -EINVAL;
00553         }
00554 
00555         index = simple_strtol(ptr - 4, &tmp, 16);
00556         if (*tmp != '-' || index > INT_MAX) {
00557                 CERROR("invalid MDT index in '%s'\n", lodname);
00558                 return -EINVAL;
00559         }
00560         *mdt_index = index;
00561         return 0;
00562 }
00563 
00578 int lod_sub_init_llog(const struct lu_env *env, struct lod_device *lod,
00579                       struct dt_device *dt)
00580 {
00581         struct obd_device               *obd;
00582         struct lod_recovery_data        *lrd = NULL;
00583         struct ptlrpc_thread            *thread;
00584         struct task_struct              *task;
00585         struct l_wait_info              lwi = { 0 };
00586         struct lod_tgt_desc             *sub_ltd = NULL;
00587         __u32                           index;
00588         __u32                           master_index;
00589         int                             rc;
00590         ENTRY;
00591 
00592         rc = lodname2mdt_index(lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, &master_index);
00593         if (rc != 0)
00594                 RETURN(rc);
00595 
00596         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lrd);
00597         if (lrd == NULL)
00598                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00599 
00600         if (lod->lod_child == dt) {
00601                 thread = &lod->lod_child_recovery_thread;
00602                 index = master_index;
00603         } else {
00604                 struct lod_tgt_descs    *ltd = &lod->lod_mdt_descs;
00605                 struct lod_tgt_desc     *tgt = NULL;
00606                 unsigned int            i;
00607 
00608                 cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
00609                         tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
00610                         if (tgt->ltd_tgt == dt) {
00611                                 index = tgt->ltd_index;
00612                                 sub_ltd = tgt;
00613                                 break;
00614                         }
00615                 }
00616                 LASSERT(sub_ltd != NULL);
00617                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(sub_ltd->ltd_recovery_thread);
00618                 if (sub_ltd->ltd_recovery_thread == NULL)
00619                         GOTO(free_lrd, rc = -ENOMEM);
00620 
00621                 thread = sub_ltd->ltd_recovery_thread;
00622         }
00623 
00624         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s init sub log %s\n", lod2obd(lod)->obd_name,
00625                dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name);
00626         lrd->lrd_lod = lod;
00627         lrd->lrd_ltd = sub_ltd;
00628         lrd->lrd_thread = thread;
00629         lrd->lrd_idx = index;
00630         init_waitqueue_head(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00631 
00632         obd = dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd;
00633         obd->obd_lvfs_ctxt.dt = dt;
00634         rc = llog_setup(env, obd, &obd->obd_olg, LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT,
00635                         NULL, &llog_common_cat_ops);
00636         if (rc < 0) {
00637                 CERROR("%s: cannot setup updatelog llog: rc = %d\n",
00638                        obd->obd_name, rc);
00639                 GOTO(free_thread, rc);
00640         }
00641 
00642         /* Start the recovery thread */
00643         task = kthread_run(lod_sub_recovery_thread, lrd, "lod%04x_rec%04x",
00644                            master_index, index);
00645         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
00646                 rc = PTR_ERR(task);
00647                 CERROR("%s: cannot start recovery thread: rc = %d\n",
00648                        obd->obd_name, rc);
00649                 GOTO(out_llog, rc);
00650         }
00651 
00652         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq, thread->t_flags & SVC_RUNNING ||
00653                                           thread->t_flags & SVC_STOPPED, &lwi);
00654 
00655         RETURN(0);
00656 out_llog:
00657         lod_sub_fini_llog(env, dt, thread);
00658 free_thread:
00659         if (lod->lod_child != dt) {
00660                 OBD_FREE_PTR(sub_ltd->ltd_recovery_thread);
00661                 sub_ltd->ltd_recovery_thread = NULL;
00662         }
00663 free_lrd:
00664         OBD_FREE_PTR(lrd);
00665         RETURN(rc);
00666 }
00667 
00676 static void lod_sub_stop_recovery_threads(const struct lu_env *env,
00677                                           struct lod_device *lod)
00678 {
00679         struct lod_tgt_descs *ltd = &lod->lod_mdt_descs;
00680         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread;
00681         unsigned int i;
00682 
00683         /* Stop the update log commit cancel threads and finish master
00684          * llog ctxt */
00685         thread = &lod->lod_child_recovery_thread;
00686         /* Stop recovery thread first */
00687         if (thread != NULL && thread->t_flags & SVC_RUNNING) {
00688                 thread->t_flags = SVC_STOPPING;
00689                 wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00690                 wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq, thread->t_flags & SVC_STOPPED);
00691         }
00692 
00693         lod_getref(ltd);
00694         cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
00695                 struct lod_tgt_desc     *tgt;
00696 
00697                 tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
00698                 thread = tgt->ltd_recovery_thread;
00699                 if (thread != NULL && thread->t_flags & SVC_RUNNING) {
00700                         thread->t_flags = SVC_STOPPING;
00701                         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00702                         wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00703                                    thread->t_flags & SVC_STOPPED);
00704                         OBD_FREE_PTR(tgt->ltd_recovery_thread);
00705                         tgt->ltd_recovery_thread = NULL;
00706                 }
00707         }
00708 
00709         lod_putref(lod, ltd);
00710 }
00711 
00720 static void lod_sub_fini_all_llogs(const struct lu_env *env,
00721                                    struct lod_device *lod)
00722 {
00723         struct lod_tgt_descs *ltd = &lod->lod_mdt_descs;
00724         unsigned int i;
00725 
00726         /* Stop the update log commit cancel threads and finish master
00727          * llog ctxt */
00728         lod_sub_fini_llog(env, lod->lod_child,
00729                           &lod->lod_child_recovery_thread);
00730         lod_getref(ltd);
00731         cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
00732                 struct lod_tgt_desc     *tgt;
00733 
00734                 tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
00735                 lod_sub_fini_llog(env, tgt->ltd_tgt,
00736                                   tgt->ltd_recovery_thread);
00737         }
00738 
00739         lod_putref(lod, ltd);
00740 }
00741 
00753 static int lod_prepare_distribute_txn(const struct lu_env *env,
00754                                       struct lod_device *lod)
00755 {
00756         struct target_distribute_txn_data *tdtd;
00757         struct lu_target                  *lut;
00758         int                               rc;
00759         ENTRY;
00760 
00761         /* Init update recovery data */
00762         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(tdtd);
00763         if (tdtd == NULL)
00764                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00765 
00766         lut = lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site->ls_tgt;
00767         tdtd->tdtd_dt = &lod->lod_dt_dev;
00768         rc = distribute_txn_init(env, lut, tdtd,
00769                 lu_site2seq(lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site)->ss_node_id);
00770 
00771         if (rc < 0) {
00772                 CERROR("%s: cannot init distribute txn: rc = %d\n",
00773                        lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, rc);
00774                 OBD_FREE_PTR(tdtd);
00775                 RETURN(rc);
00776         }
00777 
00778         lut->lut_tdtd = tdtd;
00779 
00780         RETURN(0);
00781 }
00782 
00792 static void lod_fini_distribute_txn(const struct lu_env *env,
00793                                     struct lod_device *lod)
00794 {
00795         struct lu_target                  *lut;
00796 
00797         lut = lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site->ls_tgt;
00798         if (lut->lut_tdtd == NULL)
00799                 return;
00800 
00801         distribute_txn_fini(env, lut->lut_tdtd);
00802 
00803         OBD_FREE_PTR(lut->lut_tdtd);
00804         lut->lut_tdtd = NULL;
00805 }
00806 
00840 static int lod_process_config(const struct lu_env *env,
00841                               struct lu_device *dev,
00842                               struct lustre_cfg *lcfg)
00843 {
00844         struct lod_device *lod = lu2lod_dev(dev);
00845         struct lu_device  *next = &lod->lod_child->dd_lu_dev;
00846         char              *arg1;
00847         int                rc = 0;
00848         ENTRY;
00849 
00850         switch(lcfg->lcfg_command) {
00851         case LCFG_LOV_DEL_OBD:
00852         case LCFG_LOV_ADD_INA:
00853         case LCFG_LOV_ADD_OBD:
00854         case LCFG_ADD_MDC: {
00855                 __u32 index;
00856                 __u32 mdt_index;
00857                 int gen;
00858                 /* lov_modify_tgts add  0:lov_mdsA  1:osp  2:0  3:1
00859                  * modify_mdc_tgts add  0:lustre-MDT0001
00860                  *                    1:lustre-MDT0001-mdc0002
00861                  *                    2:2  3:1*/
00862                 arg1 = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 1);
00863 
00864                 if (sscanf(lustre_cfg_buf(lcfg, 2), "%d", &index) != 1)
00865                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00866                 if (sscanf(lustre_cfg_buf(lcfg, 3), "%d", &gen) != 1)
00867                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00868 
00869                 if (lcfg->lcfg_command == LCFG_LOV_ADD_OBD) {
00870                         __u32 mdt_index;
00871 
00872                         rc = lodname2mdt_index(lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 0),
00873                                                &mdt_index);
00874                         if (rc != 0)
00875                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00876 
00877                         rc = lod_add_device(env, lod, arg1, index, gen,
00878                                             mdt_index, LUSTRE_OSC_NAME, 1);
00879                 } else if (lcfg->lcfg_command == LCFG_ADD_MDC) {
00880                         mdt_index = index;
00881                         rc = lod_add_device(env, lod, arg1, index, gen,
00882                                             mdt_index, LUSTRE_MDC_NAME, 1);
00883                 } else if (lcfg->lcfg_command == LCFG_LOV_ADD_INA) {
00884                         /*FIXME: Add mdt_index for LCFG_LOV_ADD_INA*/
00885                         mdt_index = 0;
00886                         rc = lod_add_device(env, lod, arg1, index, gen,
00887                                             mdt_index, LUSTRE_OSC_NAME, 0);
00888                 } else {
00889                         rc = lod_del_device(env, lod,
00890                                             &lod->lod_ost_descs,
00891                                             arg1, index, gen, true);
00892                 }
00893 
00894                 break;
00895         }
00896 
00897         case LCFG_PARAM: {
00898                 struct obd_device *obd;
00899                 char *param;
00900 
00901                 /* Check if it is activate/deactivate mdc
00902                  * lustre-MDTXXXX-osp-MDTXXXX.active=1 */
00903                 param = lustre_cfg_buf(lcfg, 1);
00904                 if (strstr(param, "osp") != NULL &&
00905                     strstr(param, ".active=") != NULL) {
00906                         struct lod_tgt_descs    *ltd = &lod->lod_mdt_descs;
00907                         struct lod_tgt_desc     *sub_tgt = NULL;
00908                         char *ptr;
00909                         char *tmp;
00910                         int i;
00911 
00912                         ptr = strstr(param, ".");
00913                         *ptr = '\0';
00914                         obd = class_name2obd(param);
00915                         if (obd == NULL) {
00916                                 CERROR("%s: can not find %s: rc = %d\n",
00917                                        lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, param, -EINVAL);
00918                                 *ptr = '.';
00919                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00920                         }
00921 
00922                         cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
00923                                 struct lod_tgt_desc *tgt;
00924 
00925                                 tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
00926                                 if (tgt->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd == obd) {
00927                                         sub_tgt = tgt;
00928                                         break;
00929                                 }
00930                         }
00931 
00932                         if (sub_tgt == NULL) {
00933                                 CERROR("%s: can not find %s: rc = %d\n",
00934                                        lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, param, -EINVAL);
00935                                 *ptr = '.';
00936                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00937                         }
00938 
00939                         *ptr = '.';
00940                         tmp = strstr(param, "=");
00941                         tmp++;
00942                         if (*tmp == '1') {
00943                                 struct llog_ctxt *ctxt;
00944 
00945                                 obd = sub_tgt->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd;
00946                                 ctxt = llog_get_context(obd,
00947                                                 LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
00948                                 if (ctxt == NULL) {
00949                                         rc = llog_setup(env, obd, &obd->obd_olg,
00950                                                        LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT,
00951                                                     NULL, &llog_common_cat_ops);
00952                                         if (rc < 0)
00953                                                 GOTO(out, rc);
00954                                 } else {
00955                                         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00956                                 }
00957                                 rc = lod_sub_prep_llog(env, lod,
00958                                                        sub_tgt->ltd_tgt,
00959                                                        sub_tgt->ltd_index);
00960                                 if (rc == 0)
00961                                         sub_tgt->ltd_active = 1;
00962                         } else {
00963                                 lod_sub_fini_llog(env, sub_tgt->ltd_tgt,
00964                                                   NULL);
00965                                 sub_tgt->ltd_active = 0;
00966                         }
00967                         GOTO(out, rc);
00968                 }
00969 
00970                 obd = lod2obd(lod);
00971                 rc = class_process_proc_param(PARAM_LOV, obd->obd_vars,
00972                                               lcfg, obd);
00973                 if (rc > 0)
00974                         rc = 0;
00975                 GOTO(out, rc);
00976         }
00977         case LCFG_PRE_CLEANUP: {
00978                 lod_sub_process_config(env, lod, &lod->lod_mdt_descs, lcfg);
00979                 lod_sub_process_config(env, lod, &lod->lod_ost_descs, lcfg);
00980                 next = &lod->lod_child->dd_lu_dev;
00981                 rc = next->ld_ops->ldo_process_config(env, next, lcfg);
00982                 if (rc != 0)
00983                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: can't process %u: %d\n",
00984                                lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, lcfg->lcfg_command, rc);
00985 
00986                 lod_sub_stop_recovery_threads(env, lod);
00987                 lod_fini_distribute_txn(env, lod);
00988                 lod_sub_fini_all_llogs(env, lod);
00989                 break;
00990         }
00991         case LCFG_CLEANUP: {
00992                 /*
00993                  * do cleanup on underlying storage only when
00994                  * all OSPs are cleaned up, as they use that OSD as well
00995                  */
00996                 lu_dev_del_linkage(dev->ld_site, dev);
00997                 lod_sub_process_config(env, lod, &lod->lod_mdt_descs, lcfg);
00998                 lod_sub_process_config(env, lod, &lod->lod_ost_descs, lcfg);
00999                 next = &lod->lod_child->dd_lu_dev;
01000                 rc = next->ld_ops->ldo_process_config(env, next, lcfg);
01001                 if (rc)
01002                         CERROR("%s: can't process %u: %d\n",
01003                                lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, lcfg->lcfg_command, rc);
01004 
01005                 rc = obd_disconnect(lod->lod_child_exp);
01006                 if (rc)
01007                         CERROR("error in disconnect from storage: %d\n", rc);
01008                 break;
01009         }
01010         default:
01011                CERROR("%s: unknown command %u\n", lod2obd(lod)->obd_name,
01012                       lcfg->lcfg_command);
01013                rc = -EINVAL;
01014                break;
01015         }
01016 
01017 out:
01018         RETURN(rc);
01019 }
01020 
01029 static int lod_recovery_complete(const struct lu_env *env,
01030                                  struct lu_device *dev)
01031 {
01032         struct lod_device   *lod = lu2lod_dev(dev);
01033         struct lu_device    *next = &lod->lod_child->dd_lu_dev;
01034         unsigned int         i;
01035         int                  rc;
01036         ENTRY;
01037 
01038         LASSERT(lod->lod_recovery_completed == 0);
01039         lod->lod_recovery_completed = 1;
01040 
01041         rc = next->ld_ops->ldo_recovery_complete(env, next);
01042 
01043         lod_getref(&lod->lod_ost_descs);
01044         if (lod->lod_osts_size > 0) {
01045                 cfs_foreach_bit(lod->lod_ost_bitmap, i) {
01046                         struct lod_tgt_desc *tgt;
01047                         tgt = OST_TGT(lod, i);
01048                         LASSERT(tgt && tgt->ltd_tgt);
01049                         next = &tgt->ltd_ost->dd_lu_dev;
01050                         rc = next->ld_ops->ldo_recovery_complete(env, next);
01051                         if (rc)
01052                                 CERROR("%s: can't complete recovery on #%d:"
01053                                         "%d\n", lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, i, rc);
01054                 }
01055         }
01056         lod_putref(lod, &lod->lod_ost_descs);
01057         RETURN(rc);
01058 }
01059 
01072 static int lod_sub_init_llogs(const struct lu_env *env, struct lod_device *lod)
01073 {
01074         struct lod_tgt_descs    *ltd = &lod->lod_mdt_descs;
01075         int                     rc;
01076         unsigned int            i;
01077         ENTRY;
01078 
01079         /* llog must be setup after LOD is initialized, because llog
01080          * initialization include FLD lookup */
01081         LASSERT(lod->lod_initialized);
01082 
01083         /* Init the llog in its own stack */
01084         rc = lod_sub_init_llog(env, lod, lod->lod_child);
01085         if (rc < 0)
01086                 RETURN(rc);
01087 
01088         cfs_foreach_bit(ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap, i) {
01089                 struct lod_tgt_desc     *tgt;
01090 
01091                 tgt = LTD_TGT(ltd, i);
01092                 rc = lod_sub_init_llog(env, lod, tgt->ltd_tgt);
01093                 if (rc != 0)
01094                         break;
01095         }
01096 
01097         RETURN(rc);
01098 }
01099 
01105 static int lod_prepare(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *pdev,
01106                        struct lu_device *cdev)
01107 {
01108         struct lod_device       *lod = lu2lod_dev(cdev);
01109         struct lu_device        *next = &lod->lod_child->dd_lu_dev;
01110         struct lu_fid           *fid = &lod_env_info(env)->lti_fid;
01111         int                     rc;
01112         struct dt_object        *root;
01113         struct dt_object        *dto;
01114         __u32                   index;
01115         ENTRY;
01116 
01117         rc = next->ld_ops->ldo_prepare(env, pdev, next);
01118         if (rc != 0) {
01119                 CERROR("%s: prepare bottom error: rc = %d\n",
01120                        lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, rc);
01121                 RETURN(rc);
01122         }
01123 
01124         lod->lod_initialized = 1;
01125 
01126         rc = dt_root_get(env, lod->lod_child, fid);
01127         if (rc < 0)
01128                 RETURN(rc);
01129 
01130         root = dt_locate(env, lod->lod_child, fid);
01131         if (IS_ERR(root))
01132                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(root));
01133 
01134         /* Create update log object */
01135         index = lu_site2seq(lod2lu_dev(lod)->ld_site)->ss_node_id;
01136         lu_update_log_fid(fid, index);
01137 
01138         dto = local_file_find_or_create_with_fid(env, lod->lod_child,
01139                                                  fid, root,
01140                                                  lod_update_log_name,
01141                                                  S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR);
01142         if (IS_ERR(dto))
01143                 GOTO(out_put, rc = PTR_ERR(dto));
01144 
01145         lu_object_put(env, &dto->do_lu);
01146 
01147         /* Create update log dir */
01148         lu_update_log_dir_fid(fid, index);
01149         dto = local_file_find_or_create_with_fid(env, lod->lod_child,
01150                                                  fid, root,
01151                                                  lod_update_log_dir_name,
01152                                                  S_IFDIR | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR);
01153         if (IS_ERR(dto))
01154                 GOTO(out_put, rc = PTR_ERR(dto));
01155 
01156         lu_object_put(env, &dto->do_lu);
01157 
01158         rc = lod_prepare_distribute_txn(env, lod);
01159         if (rc != 0)
01160                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01161 
01162         rc = lod_sub_init_llogs(env, lod);
01163         if (rc != 0)
01164                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01165 
01166 out_put:
01167         lu_object_put(env, &root->do_lu);
01168 
01169         RETURN(rc);
01170 }
01171 
01172 const struct lu_device_operations lod_lu_ops = {
01173         .ldo_object_alloc       = lod_object_alloc,
01174         .ldo_process_config     = lod_process_config,
01175         .ldo_recovery_complete  = lod_recovery_complete,
01176         .ldo_prepare            = lod_prepare,
01177 };

01208 static struct thandle *lod_trans_create(const struct lu_env *env,
01209                                         struct dt_device *dt)
01210 {
01211         struct thandle *th;
01212 
01213         th = top_trans_create(env, dt2lod_dev(dt)->lod_child);
01214         if (IS_ERR(th))
01215                 return th;
01216 
01217         th->th_dev = dt;
01218 
01219         return th;
01220 }

01231                            struct thandle *th)
01232 {
01233         return top_trans_start(env, dt2lod_dev(dt)->lod_child, th);

01235 
01236 static int lod_trans_cb_add(struct thandle *th,
01237                             struct dt_txn_commit_cb *dcb)
01238 {
01239         struct top_thandle      *top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle,
01240                                                        tt_super);
01241         return dt_trans_cb_add(top_th->tt_master_sub_thandle, dcb);
01242 }
01243 
01258 static int lod_add_noop_records(const struct lu_env *env,
01259                                 struct dt_device *dt, struct thandle *th,
01260                                 int count)
01261 {
01262         struct top_thandle *top_th;
01263         struct lu_fid *fid = &lod_env_info(env)->lti_fid;
01264         int i;
01265         int rc = 0;
01266 
01267         top_th = container_of(th, struct top_thandle, tt_super);
01268         if (top_th->tt_multiple_thandle == NULL)
01269                 return 0;
01270 
01271         fid_zero(fid);
01272         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
01273                 rc = update_record_pack(noop, th, fid);
01274                 if (rc < 0)
01275                         return rc;
01276         }
01277         return rc;
01278 }
01279 
01288 static int lod_trans_stop(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *dt,
01289                           struct thandle *th)
01290 {
01291         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_SPLIT_UPDATE_REC)) {
01292                 int rc;
01293 
01294                 rc = lod_add_noop_records(env, dt, th, 5000);
01295                 if (rc < 0)
01296                         RETURN(rc);
01297         }
01298         return top_trans_stop(env, dt2lod_dev(dt)->lod_child, th);
01299 }

01309                          const struct dt_device *dev,
01310                          struct dt_device_param *param)
01311 {
01312         dt_conf_get(env, dt2lod_dev((struct dt_device *)dev)->lod_child, param);
01313 }
01314 
01323 static int lod_sync(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *dev)
01324 {
01325         struct lod_device   *lod = dt2lod_dev(dev);
01326         struct lod_ost_desc *ost;
01327         unsigned int         i;
01328         int                  rc = 0;
01329         ENTRY;
01330 
01331         lod_getref(&lod->lod_ost_descs);
01332         lod_foreach_ost(lod, i) {
01333                 ost = OST_TGT(lod, i);
01334                 LASSERT(ost && ost->ltd_ost);
01335                 rc = dt_sync(env, ost->ltd_ost);
01336                 if (rc) {
01337                         CERROR("%s: can't sync %u: %d\n",
01338                                lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, i, rc);
01339                         break;
01340                 }
01341         }
01342         lod_putref(lod, &lod->lod_ost_descs);
01343         if (rc == 0)
01344                 rc = dt_sync(env, lod->lod_child);
01345 
01346         RETURN(rc);
01347 }

01358         return dt_ro(env, dt2lod_dev(dev)->lod_child);
01359 }

01379         .dt_conf_get         = lod_conf_get,
01380         .dt_sync             = lod_sync,

01382         .dt_commit_async     = lod_commit_async,
01383         .dt_trans_cb_add     = lod_trans_cb_add,
01384 };
01385 
01400 static int lod_connect_to_osd(const struct lu_env *env, struct lod_device *lod,
01401                               struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
01402 {
01403         struct obd_connect_data *data = NULL;
01404         struct obd_device       *obd;
01405         char                    *nextdev = NULL, *p, *s;
01406         int                      rc, len = 0;
01407         ENTRY;
01408 
01409         LASSERT(cfg);
01410         LASSERT(lod->lod_child_exp == NULL);
01411 
01412         /* compatibility hack: we still use old config logs
01413          * which specify LOV, but we need to learn underlying
01414          * OSD device, which is supposed to be:
01415          *  <fsname>-MDTxxxx-osd
01416          *
01417          * 2.x MGS generates lines like the following:
01418          *   #03 (176)lov_setup 0:lustre-MDT0000-mdtlov  1:(struct lov_desc)
01419          * 1.8 MGS generates lines like the following:
01420          *   #03 (168)lov_setup 0:lustre-mdtlov  1:(struct lov_desc)
01421          *
01422          * we use "-MDT" to differentiate 2.x from 1.8 */
01423 
01424         if ((p = lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0)) && strstr(p, "-mdtlov")) {
01425                 len = strlen(p) + 6;
01426                 OBD_ALLOC(nextdev, len);
01427                 if (nextdev == NULL)
01428                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01429 
01430                 strcpy(nextdev, p);
01431                 s = strstr(nextdev, "-mdtlov");
01432                 if (unlikely(s == NULL)) {
01433                         CERROR("unable to parse device name %s\n",
01434                                lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
01435                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01436                 }
01437 
01438                 if (strstr(nextdev, "-MDT")) {
01439                         /* 2.x config */
01440                         strcpy(s, "-osd");
01441                 } else {
01442                         /* 1.8 config */
01443                         strcpy(s, "-MDT0000-osd");
01444                 }
01445         } else {
01446                 CERROR("unable to parse device name %s\n",
01447                        lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
01448                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01449         }
01450 
01451         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(data);
01452         if (data == NULL)
01453                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01454 
01455         obd = class_name2obd(nextdev);
01456         if (obd == NULL) {
01457                 CERROR("can not locate next device: %s\n", nextdev);
01458                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTCONN);
01459         }
01460 
01461         data->ocd_connect_flags = OBD_CONNECT_VERSION;
01462         data->ocd_version = LUSTRE_VERSION_CODE;
01463 
01464         rc = obd_connect(env, &lod->lod_child_exp, obd, &obd->obd_uuid,
01465                          data, NULL);
01466         if (rc) {
01467                 CERROR("cannot connect to next dev %s (%d)\n", nextdev, rc);
01468                 GOTO(out, rc);
01469         }
01470 
01471         lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site =
01472                 lod->lod_child_exp->exp_obd->obd_lu_dev->ld_site;
01473         LASSERT(lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site);
01474         lod->lod_child = lu2dt_dev(lod->lod_child_exp->exp_obd->obd_lu_dev);
01475 
01476 out:
01477         if (data)
01478                 OBD_FREE_PTR(data);
01479         if (nextdev)
01480                 OBD_FREE(nextdev, len);
01481         RETURN(rc);
01482 }
01483 
01495 static int lod_tgt_desc_init(struct lod_tgt_descs *ltd)
01496 {
01497         mutex_init(&ltd->ltd_mutex);
01498         init_rwsem(&ltd->ltd_rw_sem);
01499 
01500         /* the OST array and bitmap are allocated/grown dynamically as OSTs are
01501          * added to the LOD, see lod_add_device() */
01502         ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap = CFS_ALLOCATE_BITMAP(32);
01503         if (ltd->ltd_tgt_bitmap == NULL)
01504                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01505 
01506         ltd->ltd_tgts_size  = 32;
01507         ltd->ltd_tgtnr      = 0;
01508 
01509         ltd->ltd_death_row = 0;
01510         ltd->ltd_refcount  = 0;
01511         return 0;
01512 }
01513 
01529 static int lod_init0(const struct lu_env *env, struct lod_device *lod,
01530                      struct lu_device_type *ldt, struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
01531 {
01532         struct dt_device_param ddp;
01533         struct obd_device     *obd;
01534         int                    rc;
01535         ENTRY;
01536 
01537         obd = class_name2obd(lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
01538         if (obd == NULL) {
01539                 CERROR("Cannot find obd with name %s\n",
01540                        lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
01541                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
01542         }
01543 
01544         obd->obd_lu_dev = &lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev;
01545         lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_obd = obd;
01546         lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_ops = &lod_lu_ops;
01547         lod->lod_dt_dev.dd_ops = &lod_dt_ops;
01548 
01549         rc = lod_connect_to_osd(env, lod, cfg);
01550         if (rc)
01551                 RETURN(rc);
01552 
01553         dt_conf_get(env, &lod->lod_dt_dev, &ddp);
01554         lod->lod_osd_max_easize = ddp.ddp_max_ea_size;
01555 
01556         /* setup obd to be used with old lov code */
01557         rc = lod_pools_init(lod, cfg);
01558         if (rc)
01559                 GOTO(out_disconnect, rc);
01560 
01561         rc = lod_procfs_init(lod);
01562         if (rc)
01563                 GOTO(out_pools, rc);
01564 
01565         spin_lock_init(&lod->lod_desc_lock);
01566         spin_lock_init(&lod->lod_connects_lock);
01567         lod_tgt_desc_init(&lod->lod_mdt_descs);
01568         lod_tgt_desc_init(&lod->lod_ost_descs);
01569 
01570         RETURN(0);
01571 
01572 out_pools:
01573         lod_pools_fini(lod);
01574 out_disconnect:
01575         obd_disconnect(lod->lod_child_exp);
01576         RETURN(rc);
01577 }
01578 
01586 static struct lu_device *lod_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
01587                                          struct lu_device *lu)
01588 {
01589         struct lod_device *lod = lu2lod_dev(lu);
01590         struct lu_device  *next = &lod->lod_child->dd_lu_dev;
01591         ENTRY;
01592 
01593         LASSERTF(atomic_read(&lu->ld_ref) == 0, "lu is %p\n", lu);
01594         dt_device_fini(&lod->lod_dt_dev);
01595         OBD_FREE_PTR(lod);
01596         RETURN(next);
01597 }
01598 
01606 static struct lu_device *lod_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
01607                                           struct lu_device_type *type,
01608                                           struct lustre_cfg *lcfg)
01609 {
01610         struct lod_device *lod;
01611         struct lu_device  *lu_dev;
01612 
01613         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lod);
01614         if (lod == NULL) {
01615                 lu_dev = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
01616         } else {
01617                 int rc;
01618 
01619                 lu_dev = lod2lu_dev(lod);
01620                 dt_device_init(&lod->lod_dt_dev, type);
01621                 rc = lod_init0(env, lod, type, lcfg);
01622                 if (rc != 0) {
01623                         lod_device_free(env, lu_dev);
01624                         lu_dev = ERR_PTR(rc);
01625                 }
01626         }
01627 
01628         return lu_dev;
01629 }
01630 
01638 static struct lu_device *lod_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
01639                                          struct lu_device *d)
01640 {
01641         struct lod_device *lod = lu2lod_dev(d);
01642         int                rc;
01643         ENTRY;
01644 
01645         lod_pools_fini(lod);
01646 
01647         lod_procfs_fini(lod);
01648 
01649         rc = lod_fini_tgt(env, lod, &lod->lod_ost_descs, true);
01650         if (rc)
01651                 CERROR("%s:can not fini ost descs %d\n",
01652                         lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, rc);
01653 
01654         rc = lod_fini_tgt(env, lod, &lod->lod_mdt_descs, false);
01655         if (rc)
01656                 CERROR("%s:can not fini mdt descs %d\n",
01657                         lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, rc);
01658 
01659         RETURN(NULL);
01660 }
01661 
01678 static int lod_obd_connect(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export **exp,
01679                            struct obd_device *obd, struct obd_uuid *cluuid,
01680                            struct obd_connect_data *data, void *localdata)
01681 {
01682         struct lod_device    *lod = lu2lod_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
01683         struct lustre_handle  conn;
01684         int                   rc;
01685         ENTRY;
01686 
01687         CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "connect #%d\n", lod->lod_connects);
01688 
01689         rc = class_connect(&conn, obd, cluuid);
01690         if (rc)
01691                 RETURN(rc);
01692 
01693         *exp = class_conn2export(&conn);
01694 
01695         spin_lock(&lod->lod_connects_lock);
01696         lod->lod_connects++;
01697         /* at the moment we expect the only user */
01698         LASSERT(lod->lod_connects == 1);
01699         spin_unlock(&lod->lod_connects_lock);
01700 
01701         RETURN(0);
01702 }
01703 
01717 static int lod_obd_disconnect(struct obd_export *exp)
01718 {
01719         struct obd_device *obd = exp->exp_obd;
01720         struct lod_device *lod = lu2lod_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
01721         int                rc, release = 0;
01722         ENTRY;
01723 
01724         /* Only disconnect the underlying layers on the final disconnect. */
01725         spin_lock(&lod->lod_connects_lock);
01726         lod->lod_connects--;
01727         if (lod->lod_connects != 0) {
01728                 /* why should there be more than 1 connect? */
01729                 spin_unlock(&lod->lod_connects_lock);
01730                 CERROR("%s: disconnect #%d\n", exp->exp_obd->obd_name,
01731                        lod->lod_connects);
01732                 goto out;
01733         }
01734         spin_unlock(&lod->lod_connects_lock);
01735 
01736         /* the last user of lod has gone, let's release the device */
01737         release = 1;
01738 
01739 out:
01740         rc = class_disconnect(exp); /* bz 9811 */
01741 
01742         if (rc == 0 && release)
01743                 class_manual_cleanup(obd);
01744         RETURN(rc);
01745 }
01746 
01747 LU_KEY_INIT(lod, struct lod_thread_info);
01748 
01749 static void lod_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
01750                 struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
01751 {
01752         struct lod_thread_info *info = data;
01753         /* allocated in lod_get_lov_ea
01754          * XXX: this is overload, a tread may have such store but used only
01755          * once. Probably better would be pool of such stores per LOD.
01756          */
01757         if (info->lti_ea_store) {
01758                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(info->lti_ea_store, info->lti_ea_store_size);
01759                 info->lti_ea_store = NULL;
01760                 info->lti_ea_store_size = 0;
01761         }
01762         lu_buf_free(&info->lti_linkea_buf);
01763         OBD_FREE_PTR(info);
01764 }
01765 
01766 /* context key: lod_thread_key */
01767 LU_CONTEXT_KEY_DEFINE(lod, LCT_MD_THREAD);
01768 
01769 LU_TYPE_INIT_FINI(lod, &lod_thread_key);

01773         .ldto_fini           = lod_type_fini,
01774 
01775         .ldto_start          = lod_type_start,
01776         .ldto_stop           = lod_type_stop,
01777 
01778         .ldto_device_alloc   = lod_device_alloc,
01779         .ldto_device_free    = lod_device_free,
01780 
01781         .ldto_device_fini    = lod_device_fini
01782 };

01784 static struct lu_device_type lod_device_type = {
01785         .ldt_tags     = LU_DEVICE_DT,
01786         .ldt_name     = LUSTRE_LOD_NAME,
01787         .ldt_ops      = &lod_device_type_ops,
01788         .ldt_ctx_tags = LCT_MD_THREAD,
01789 };

01811 static int lod_obd_get_info(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export *exp,
01812                             __u32 keylen, void *key, __u32 *vallen, void *val)
01813 {
01814         int rc = -EINVAL;
01815 
01816         if (KEY_IS(KEY_OSP_CONNECTED)) {
01817                 struct obd_device       *obd = exp->exp_obd;
01818                 struct lod_device       *d;
01819                 struct lod_tgt_desc     *tgt;
01820                 unsigned int            i;
01821                 int                     rc = 1;
01822 
01823                 if (!obd->obd_set_up || obd->obd_stopping)
01824                         RETURN(-EAGAIN);
01825 
01826                 d = lu2lod_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
01827                 lod_getref(&d->lod_ost_descs);
01828                 lod_foreach_ost(d, i) {
01829                         tgt = OST_TGT(d, i);
01830                         LASSERT(tgt && tgt->ltd_tgt);
01831                         rc = obd_get_info(env, tgt->ltd_exp, keylen, key,
01832                                           vallen, val);
01833                         /* one healthy device is enough */
01834                         if (rc == 0)
01835                                 break;
01836                 }
01837                 lod_putref(d, &d->lod_ost_descs);
01838 
01839                 lod_getref(&d->lod_mdt_descs);
01840                 lod_foreach_mdt(d, i) {
01841                         struct llog_ctxt *ctxt;
01842 
01843                         tgt = MDT_TGT(d, i);
01844                         LASSERT(tgt != NULL);
01845                         LASSERT(tgt->ltd_tgt != NULL);
01846                         if (!tgt->ltd_active)
01847                                 continue;
01848 
01849                         ctxt = llog_get_context(tgt->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd,
01850                                                 LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
01851                         if (ctxt == NULL) {
01852                                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: %s is not ready.\n",
01853                                        obd->obd_name,
01854                                       tgt->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name);
01855                                 rc = -EAGAIN;
01856                                 break;
01857                         }
01858                         if (ctxt->loc_handle == NULL) {
01859                                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: %s is not ready.\n",
01860                                        obd->obd_name,
01861                                       tgt->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name);
01862                                 rc = -EAGAIN;
01863                                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
01864                                 break;
01865                         }
01866                         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
01867                 }
01868                 lod_putref(d, &d->lod_mdt_descs);
01869 
01870                 RETURN(rc);
01871         }
01872 
01873         RETURN(rc);
01874 }
01875 
01876 static int lod_obd_set_info_async(const struct lu_env *env,
01877                                   struct obd_export *exp,
01878                                   __u32 keylen, void *key,
01879                                   __u32 vallen, void *val,
01880                                   struct ptlrpc_request_set *set)
01881 {
01882         struct obd_device *obd = class_exp2obd(exp);
01883         struct lod_device *d;
01884         struct lod_tgt_desc *tgt;
01885         int no_set = 0;
01886         int i, rc = 0, rc2;
01887         ENTRY;
01888 
01889         if (set == NULL) {
01890                 no_set = 1;
01891                 set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
01892                 if (!set)
01893                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01894         }
01895 
01896         d = lu2lod_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
01897         lod_getref(&d->lod_ost_descs);
01898         lod_foreach_ost(d, i) {
01899                 tgt = OST_TGT(d, i);
01900                 LASSERT(tgt && tgt->ltd_tgt);
01901                 if (!tgt->ltd_active)
01902                         continue;
01903 
01904                 rc2 = obd_set_info_async(env, tgt->ltd_exp, keylen, key,
01905                                          vallen, val, set);
01906                 if (rc2 != 0 && rc == 0)
01907                         rc = rc2;
01908         }
01909         lod_putref(d, &d->lod_ost_descs);
01910 
01911         lod_getref(&d->lod_mdt_descs);
01912         lod_foreach_mdt(d, i) {
01913                 tgt = MDT_TGT(d, i);
01914                 LASSERT(tgt && tgt->ltd_tgt);
01915                 if (!tgt->ltd_active)
01916                         continue;
01917                 rc2 = obd_set_info_async(env, tgt->ltd_exp, keylen, key,
01918                                          vallen, val, set);
01919                 if (rc2 != 0 && rc == 0)
01920                         rc = rc2;
01921         }
01922         lod_putref(d, &d->lod_mdt_descs);
01923 
01924 
01925         if (no_set) {
01926                 rc2 = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
01927                 if (rc2 == 0 && rc == 0)
01928                         rc = rc2;
01929                 ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
01930         }
01931         RETURN(rc);
01932 }
01933 
01934 static struct obd_ops lod_obd_device_ops = {
01935         .o_owner        = THIS_MODULE,
01936         .o_connect      = lod_obd_connect,
01937         .o_disconnect   = lod_obd_disconnect,
01938         .o_get_info     = lod_obd_get_info,
01939         .o_set_info_async = lod_obd_set_info_async,
01940         .o_pool_new     = lod_pool_new,
01941         .o_pool_rem     = lod_pool_remove,
01942         .o_pool_add     = lod_pool_add,
01943         .o_pool_del     = lod_pool_del,
01944 };
01945 
01946 static int __init lod_init(void)
01947 {
01948         struct obd_type *type;
01949         int rc;
01950 
01951         rc = lu_kmem_init(lod_caches);
01952         if (rc)
01953                 return rc;
01954 
01955         rc = class_register_type(&lod_obd_device_ops, NULL, true, NULL,
01956                                  LUSTRE_LOD_NAME, &lod_device_type);
01957         if (rc) {
01958                 lu_kmem_fini(lod_caches);
01959                 return rc;
01960         }
01961 
01962         /* create "lov" entry in procfs for compatibility purposes */
01963         type = class_search_type(LUSTRE_LOV_NAME);
01964         if (type != NULL && type->typ_procroot != NULL)
01965                 return rc;
01966 
01967         type = class_search_type(LUSTRE_LOD_NAME);
01968         type->typ_procsym = lprocfs_register("lov", proc_lustre_root,
01969                                              NULL, NULL);
01970         if (IS_ERR(type->typ_procsym)) {
01971                 CERROR("lod: can't create compat entry \"lov\": %d\n",
01972                        (int)PTR_ERR(type->typ_procsym));
01973                 type->typ_procsym = NULL;
01974         }
01975         return rc;
01976 }
01977 
01978 static void __exit lod_exit(void)
01979 {
01980         class_unregister_type(LUSTRE_LOD_NAME);
01981         lu_kmem_fini(lod_caches);
01982 }

01989 module_init(lod_init);
